generated_description: dura color, legally known as duracolor uk ltd., based in london, england, specializes in providing natural food colors and cosmetic dyes. the company offers a wide range of products including food colors, cosmetic colors, pigments, basic dyes, acid dyes, fluorescent dyes, solvent dyes, and salt-free liquid dyes. duracolor is committed to using pure and sustainable ingredients to enhance the visual appeal and quality of products in the food and cosmetics industries. their offerings are free from synthetic additives and preservatives, promoting both aesthetic and health-conscious choices.
